title: Memorial "Rock under Surveillance"
unterschrift: Memorial in front of visitors center, Mauthausen Memorial
intro_text: To mark the opening of the exhibition "Power and Powerlessness - People, Traces, Shadows" in Mauthausen, a new memorial by Seiji Kimoto titled "Rock under Surveillance" was handed over to Mauthausen Memorial during a special ceremony at the visitors center on September 11th, 2006. The installation takes up the form of the camp's watchtowers. The casting of the steel sculpture was supported by the Ministry of Education, Culture ad Science of the Saarland, Sparkasse Neunkirchen and the Saarland Sport Toto GmbH.
